description: This provides the preferred backing option for guest RAM. Guest's memory can be backed by hugepages to limit TLB lookups. See also: https://wiki.openstack.org/wiki/VirtDriverGuestCPUMemoryPlacement

mem_page_size.title: Size of memory page
mem_page_size.description: Page size to be used for Guest memory backing. Value can be specified as <number><unit> (i.e.: 2MB, 1GB) or 'any', 'small', 'large'. If this property is set in Image metadata then only 'any' and 'large' values are accepted in Flavor metadata by Nova API.
